sentences: Vania Dantas Leite (13 August 1945 â€“ 10 August 2018) was a Brazilian composer, pianist, electronic musician, conductor and music educator.
Vania Dantas Leite was born in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, and studied composition with Frederico Egger and piano with Zila de M. Brito at the Escola Nacional de Musica.
In 1974 she began to study electronic music and purchased equipment from Electronic Music Studio in London.
She established a private laboratory in Rio de Janeiro and began to participate in European and American festivals as a composer of electronic music.
